mapper.select: select * from lineup order by lno asc
mapper.insert: insert into lineup(lno, dno, aname, contents, song1, song2, song3, file) values(#{lno}, #{dno}, #{aname}, #{contents}, #{song1}, #{song2}, #{song3}, #{file})
mapper.select: select lno, dno, aname, contents, song1, song2, song3 from lineup where lno = #{lno}
mapper.update: update lineup set lno = #{lno}, dno = #{dno}, aname = #{aname}, contents = #{contents}, song1 = #{song1}, song2 = #{song2}, song3 = #{song3} where lno = #{lno}
